data.name: Down to Hell
data.detailed_description:
JOIN US ON DISCORD!


Down to Hell has official Discord server. Join it now!


About the Game


Down to Hell is a dynamic slasher in which lone swordsman must face the hordes of hellish demons. On five huge levels, fighting against more than thirty kinds of enemies, the player will learn the story of a nameless knight and a mysterious girl.

Each and every one of the demons will have a couple of different attacks, which will require a different reaction from the player. On each stage, there will be at least two mini-bosses, as well as one more powerful boss that will be waiting at the end of each level.



Features:
  • Challenging combat
  • 5 types of different weapons
  • Combos!
  • Heave F’N Metal Soundtrack! (KORONAL and more!)
  • Almost 20 bosses to kill!

data.short_description: Down to hell is a dynamic slasher in which lone swordsman must face the hordes of hellish demons. Moreover Down to Hell will give you truly Heavy F’N Metal experience.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9600 GT/ AMD Radeon HD 6450
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GT520 / AMD Radeon HD 6670 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Sound card

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mavericks 10.9 or later
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9600 GT/ AMD Radeon HD 6450
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Sound card

developers: Red Dev Studio Sp. z o.o.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: General Mature Content
